desc: Software development, testing and documentation, project management, sales support in various client projects
Projects I worked on: the Digital Manual app in MAN's truck infotainment system
Co-creator of open source project: Eloqua Speech Listening App
Developed and submitted analytical reports for corporate overseas projects
Worked in a small team to convert supplier needs questionnaires into online forms using polling apps like LimeSurvey
Conferred with engineering colleagues in planning of development of e-commerce platform for corporate clients
Developed and administered English contracts and monthly billing check of launched games
Translation and quality assurance of game documentation in English
